resources.string:
About:
 This simple app will return all color information
 available in the source code of any desired website.
 Please note this will not return all colors
 found on a webpage, only the publicly available
 colors from the page source.
 This app works by pulling the source code into a
 bufferReader, the buffer is searched for any
 instances of a hexadecimal value matching that 
 of a color value. A list of unique colors is returned.

 How to Use:
 Enter your desired URL. Press the search button when
 ready. When the list of colors is returned, simple tap
 on any color to copy the hexadecimal value to your
 clipboard. (Note: Please make sure you have a stable
 internet connection. If an /"Invalid URL/" message is
 displayed, please make sure you have entered the correct
 protocol, domain and resource.
